body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes      General admissionAdults: $14.95 Seniors: $11.95 Students (13-18 or with student ID): $10.95 Children (5-12): $9.95 Under 5: Free General admission includes a guided tour of the Museum's historic hotel tour. Prices of other tours vary.National Park Pass holders can receive a $2 discount off general admission.
title: Wing Luke Museum Affiliated Area: Fees & Passes
